block.field:
Welcome to the [ GLIFTEK ] Web Storage Plugin Demo.
 Instructions:
 Left Click: Move objects
 Middle Click: Scale Objects
 Right Click: Rotate Objects

To access your browser's offline web storage interface,
 open your Broswer Dev Tools (f12 on most) and select:

Firefox: Storage Tab
 Chrome: Application Tab, Storage Section
 Edge: Application Tab, Storage Section
 Opera: Ctrl+Shift+I, Application Tab, Storage Section

Links to browser support stats of the three storage drivers
 used in this plugin:
 IndexedDB - https://caniuse.com/indexeddb
 LocalStorage - https://caniuse.com/mdn-api_window_localstorage
 WebSQL - https://caniuse.com/sql-storage
GLIFTEK Web Storage plugin demo. Saves objects data to browser storage for later retrivial.
